title: Two killed, three injured in traffic accident
content:
MULTAN, Aug 27 (APP): Two persons of the same family were killed and three others sustained injuries in a traffic accident that occurred near Kheera Chowk area of Multan, tv channels quoting Rescue sources reported on Tuesday.
According to details, a rashly driven bus hit the two wheeler near Kheera chowk area.  As a result, two people of the same family died on the spot. The woman and two children were also injured in the same incident.
Rescue and Police team rushed to the site for shifting dead and injured to nearby hospital.
